english.segment1: . Tell me where our time went. And if it was time well spent. Just don't let me fall asleep. Feeling empty again
english.segment2: 'Cause I fear I might break. And I fear I can't take it. Tonight I'll lay awake, feeling empty
english.segment3: I can feel the pressure. It's getting closer now. We're better off without you. I can feel the pressure. It's getting closer now. We're better off without you
english.segment4: Now that I'm losing hope. And there's nothing else to show. For all of the days that we spent. Carried away from home
english.segment5: Somethings I'll never know. And I had to let them go. I'm sitting all alone, feeling empty
english.segment6: I can feel the pressure. It's getting closer now. We're better off without you. I can feel the pressure. It's getting closer now. We're better off without you
english.segment7: Somethings I'll never know, and I had to let them go. Somethings I'll never know, and I had to let them go. I'm sitting all alone feeling empty
english.segment8: I can feel the pressure. It's getting closer now. We're better off without you. Feel the pressure. It's getting closer now. You're better off with out me
